section.10: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Sa'eed that the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) saw that his companions tended to stand in the rear, so he said:"Come forward and follow me, and let those who are behind you follow your lead. If people continue to lag behind, Allah, the Mighty and Sublime, will put them back
